page.title: 06RISELEY VILLAGE BLACKSMITH(2
page.content: Mr. Pentlow is the only agricul- tural engineer within a l0 mile radius. As well as repairing parts of tractors and combine harvesters Mr. Pentlow works on different metal objects including garden tools, guns occasionally and gates. Many housewives take household objects such as saucepans, kettles and even scissors to be mended. He is prepared to mend bicycles too and has been known to design and make large fire-grates. The smallest object repaired was a clock spring, the largest a l00 ton trailer.
